The `withdraw` function should be protected to ensure that only the contract owner      or an authorized entity can initiate a withdrawal.","kind":"dev","methods":{"withdraw(address,uint256,address)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens to withdraw.","recipient":"The address that will receive the withdrawn tokens.","token":"The address of the ERC20 token to withdraw, or address(0) to withdraw native tokens."}}},"title":"IFundsManager Interface","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"withdraw(address,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Withdraws tokens from the contract to a specified recipient's address."}},"notice":"This interface defines the functionality for withdrawing funds from the contract to a specified address.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/interfaces/IFundsManager.sol":"IFundsManager"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":20000},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/=node_modules/@openzeppelin/",":eth-gas-reporter/=node_modules/eth-gas-reporter/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":hardhat/=node_modules/hardhat/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/interfaces/IFundsManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x37e871584c1a4d38f5f34d90501fb4c048601f3fe480660be920a48a1d21d2c8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f60366f2274cb10c9e6298462ee199a638c94f523b7f8de730316772fb7d5f32","dweb:/ipfs/QmX9jXtgUqL9nnyM7ZYdwRnm5XdtrxfWeGxskivrVpLcjY"]}},"version":1}

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.
params.recipient: The address that will receive the withdrawn tokens.
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to withdraw, or address(0) to withdraw native tokens.

withdraw(address,uint256,address).notice: Withdraws tokens from the contract to a specified recipient's address.
